price: 107. Nkolo wa biso, bimisa biso okati na yango, mpe soki tozongeli, tokozala babubi.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā akhrij'nā min'hā fa-in ʿud'nā fa-innā ẓālimūna
